data.why:
We have designed a Indic Language code converter. Indic comprises
    of Hindi, Punjabi, Gujrati, Bangla, Marathi, Tamil, Telugu, Kannada,
    Malayalam, etc. We have designed a Perl module to convert ISCII
    encoded text to Unicode and vice versa. Moreover it has also support
    for converting WX-Roman encoded text to Unicode. WX-Roman is an
    encoding standard used by NLP Researchers in India & abroad.
